pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br)Health: 200

Summoned from an $(l:misc/blocks/boss_blocks#evol_boss_block)Evol Boss Block$(/l)$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Uses his $(l:build/riders/evol#black_hole)Black Hole$(/l) form at under 100 health if you have the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#pandora_box)Pandora Box$(/l) in your inventory$(li)Transforms into $(l:build/riders/evol#phantom_state)Evolto Phantom State$(/l) at under 50 health if you have the $(l:misc/blocks/last_pandora_panel_black)Last Pandora Panel (Black)$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops on next page

Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottles$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/evolbottles#cobra_evol_bottle)Cobra Evol Bottle$(/l) (75%)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/evolbottles#rider_system_evol_bottle)Rider System Evol Bottle$(/l) (25%)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/evol_trigger)Evol Trigger$(/l) (with the $(l:misc/blocks/machine_blocks#pandora_box)Pandora Box$(/l) in your inventory)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/fullbottles#silver_dragon_full_bottle)Silver Dragon Fullbottle$(/l) (50%) (with the $(l:misc/blocks/last_pandora_panel_black)Last Pandora Panel (Black)$(/l) in your inventory)$(li)1 $(l:build/items/fullbottles#gold_rabbit_full_bottle)Gold Rabbit Fullbottle$(/l) (50%) (with the $(l:misc/blocks/last_pandora_panel_black)Last Pandora Panel (Black)$(/l) in your inventory)
